snippet: Diego Costa increased his total to seven goals in four games with a hat trick, and Chelsea earned its fourth win in four Premier League games this season.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Chelsea defeats Swansea, 4-2; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Diego Costa increased his total to seven goals in four games with a hat trick, and Chelsea earned its fourth win in four Premier League games this season.

headline.main: Chelsea and Striker Continue Strong Play
headline.print_headline: Chelsea and Striker Continue Strong Play
